nodes.text: Group 3 was a squad of one Gian speeder and was formed as diversionary force by the Royal Naboo Security Forces in 32 BBY to assist in the recapture of the planet Naboo's capital, Theed from the Trade Federation. Group 3 was responsible for escorting a commando transport. During the battle, Group 3 became delayed and was late meeting Group 2 and Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes at the Theed Courthouse. The combined force then led the commandos to blow open a gate blocking their way to the Theed Hangar.
Group 3 appears in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo. If the commando transport is destroyed, the player, in the role of Sykes, fails the mission.
